description.zh-cn: 祖籍福建安溪的新加坡归国华侨，中国共产党党员，中华人民共和国法学家、教育家、社会活动家及政治人物。曾任国家级副职领导人，是中国现代行政法学的开拓者与奠基人。他还担任过中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席、中国致公党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国最高人民法院副院长等职务。
description.en: Luo Haocai was a returned overseas Chinese from Singapore with ancestral roots in Anxi, Fujian. He was a member of the Communist Party of China, a jurist, educator, social activist, and political figure of the People's Republic of China. He served as a deputy national leader and is recognized as a pioneer and founder of modern administrative law in China. His prominent roles included Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party, and Vice President of the Supreme People's Court of the PRC.

en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的副职领导职务，属于国家级副职领导人。
description.en: The deputy leadership position of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, ranked as a deputy national leader.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国致公党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国致公党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国致公党中央委员会主席，是罗豪才的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party, and predecessor to Luo Haocai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替罗豪才担任中国致公党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Luo Haocai as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一，由华侨社团发起，罗豪才曾任其中央委员会主席。
description.en: One of the eight democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, founded by overseas Chinese communities. Luo Haocai served as the chairman of its central committee.

description.zh-cn: 研究行政法律规范及其发展规律的法律科学，罗豪才是中国现代该领域的开拓者与奠基人。
description.en: The legal science that studies administrative legal norms and their developmental patterns. Luo Haocai is a pioneer and founder of this field in modern China.

description.zh-cn: 指19世纪末至20世纪中叶日本的扩张主义政策和军事行动。其在新加坡的侵略行为给罗豪才的童年带来了深刻的创伤。
description.en: Refers to the expansionist policies and military actions of Japan from the late 19th to the mid-20th century. Its aggression in Singapore caused deep trauma to Luo Haocai's childhood.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家。其在新加坡的殖民当局曾因罗豪才参与反对殖民统治的斗争而将其逮捕并驱逐。
description.en: A European country. Its colonial authorities in Singapore arrested and deported Luo Haocai for his participation in the struggle against colonial rule.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省广州市的一所中学，罗豪才曾在此就读。
description.en: A middle school in Guangzhou, Guangdong, China, where Luo Haocai once studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省无锡市的一所中学，罗豪才曾在此就读。
description.en: A middle school in Wuxi, Jiangsu, China, where Luo Haocai once studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖高等学府，罗豪才在此完成大学学业并长期任教，曾任副校长。
description.en: A top institution of higher learning in China, where Luo Haocai completed his university studies and taught for many years, eventually serving as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学，罗豪才曾在此进修。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, USA, where Luo Haocai pursued advanced studies.

description.zh-cn: 美国行政法奠基人，曾是罗豪才在哥伦比亚大学进修时的联系导师。
description.en: A founder of American administrative law, who was Luo Haocai's contact advisor during his studies at Columbia University.

description.zh-cn: 中国法学家，与罗豪才等人于1990年代初率先提出“现代行政法的平衡理论”。
description.en: Chinese jurist who, along with Luo Haocai and others, pioneered the 'balance theory of modern administrative law' in the early 1990s.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国行政诉讼法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国行政诉讼法
en: Administrative Procedure Law of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 规范中国行政诉讼制度的法律，俗称“民告官”法。其建立与施行受到罗豪才等行政法学家的推动。
description.en: The law regulating the administrative litigation system in China, commonly known as the 'people sue officials' law. Its establishment and implementation were promoted by administrative law scholars like Luo Haocai.

nodes.id: 中华全国归国华侨联合会

zh-cn: 中华全国归国华侨联合会
en: All-China Federation of Returned Overseas Chinese

description.zh-cn: 由全国归国华侨、侨眷组成的全国性人民团体，罗豪才曾任副主席。
description.en: A national-level people's organization composed of returned overseas Chinese and their relatives from across the country. Luo Haocai served as its Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国法学界、法律界的全国性群众团体和学术团体，罗豪才曾任副会长。
description.en: A national mass and academic organization for the legal and academic circles in China. Luo Haocai served as its Vice President.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高审判机关，罗豪才曾任副院长。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China. Luo Haocai served as its Vice President.

en: China Council for the Promotion of Peaceful National Reunification

description.zh-cn: 由赞成中国统一的各界人士组成的民间团体，罗豪才曾任会长。
description.en: A non-governmental organization composed of individuals from all walks of life who support the reunification of China. Luo Haocai served as its President.

en: China Society for Human Rights Studies

description.zh-cn: 中国在人权领域唯一的全国性学术团体，罗豪才曾任会长。
description.en: The only national academic organization in the field of human rights in China. Luo Haocai served as its President.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国领导人职务级别之一，罗豪才因担任全国政协副主席而位列其中。
description.en: One of the leadership position levels in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. Luo Haocai held this rank as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1826年至1946年英国在东南亚的殖民地，罗豪才于1934年在此地（新加坡）出生。
description.en: A British colony in Southeast Asia from 1826 to 1946. Luo Haocai was born here (in Singapore) in 1934.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才担任中国人民政治协商会议第九届、十届全国委员会副主席。
description.en: Luo Haocai served as the Vice Chairman of the 9th and 10th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才担任第九届全国政协副主席期间，李瑞环是时任全国政协主席。
description.en: During Luo Haocai's term as Vice Chairman of the 9th CPPCC, Li Ruihuan was the serving Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才担任第十届全国政协副主席期间，贾庆林是时任全国政协主席。
description.en: During Luo Haocai's term as Vice Chairman of the 10th CPPCC, Jia Qinglin was the serving Chairman.

relationships.target: 中国致公党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才担任中国致公党第十一届、十二届中央委员会主席。
description.en: Luo Haocai served as the Chairman of the 11th and 12th Central Committees of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才接替董寅初，当选为中国致公党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Luo Haocai succeeded Dong Yinchu as the elected Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 万钢接替罗豪才，当选为中国致公党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Wan Gang succeeded Luo Haocai as the elected Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Luo Haocai was a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才是中国致公党党员，并曾担任其最高领导人。
description.en: Luo Haocai was a member of the China Zhi Gong Party and served as its top leader.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才被认为是中国现代行政法学的开拓者与奠基人。
description.en: Luo Haocai is considered a pioneer and founder of modern administrative law in China.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才幼年时，因日本侵略新加坡，其不少亲友被杀害，使他自幼便痛恨日本帝国主义。
description.en: During Luo Haocai's childhood, many of his relatives and friends were killed due to the Japanese invasion of Singapore, causing him to hate Japanese imperialism from a young age.

description.zh-cn: 因参加反对英国殖民统治的斗争，罗豪才被新加坡的英国殖民当局逮捕、监禁，并最终被驱逐出境。
description.en: For participating in the struggle against British colonial rule, Luo Haocai was arrested, imprisoned, and ultimately deported by the British colonial authorities in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 1952年至1956年期间，罗豪才先后在广州市知用中学和无锡市第一中学学习。
description.en: Between 1952 and 1956, Luo Haocai studied at Guangzhou Zhiyong Middle School and subsequently at Wuxi No. 1 High School.

description.zh-cn: 1952年至1956年期间，罗豪才先后在广州市知用中学和无锡市第一中学学习。
description.en: Between 1952 and 1956, Luo Haocai studied at Guangzhou Zhiyong Middle School and subsequently at Wuxi No. 1 High School.

description.zh-cn: 1956年至1960年在北京大学法律系学习。
description.en: Studied at the Department of Law, Peking University from 1956 to 1960.

position.zh-cn: 助教、讲师、系副主任、副校长、教授
position.en: Teaching Assistant, Lecturer, Deputy Head of Department, Vice President, Professor

description.zh-cn: 1960年毕业后留校任教，至1995年，历任北京大学法律系助教、讲师、系副主任、副校长、教授等职。
description.en: After graduating in 1960, he stayed at Peking University to teach until 1995, holding positions such as Teaching Assistant, Lecturer, Deputy Head of the Law Department, Vice President, and Professor.

description.zh-cn: 1984年至1985年赴美国哥伦比亚大学进修。
description.en: From 1984 to 1985, he went to Columbia University in the United States for advanced studies.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才在哥伦比亚大学进修期间，欧内斯特·盖尔霍恩是其联系导师。
description.en: During Luo Haocai's advanced studies at Columbia University, Ernest Gellhorn was his contact advisor.

description.zh-cn: 1990年代初，罗豪才与袁曙宏等人率先提出“现代行政法的平衡理论”。
description.en: In the early 1990s, Luo Haocai, along with Yuan Shuhong and others, pioneered the 'balance theory of modern administrative law'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国行政诉讼法

description.zh-cn: 作为中国现代行政法学的开拓者，罗豪才的学术活动和理论研究为《中华人民共和国行政诉讼法》的建立与施行起到了推动作用。
description.en: As a pioneer of modern administrative law in China, Luo Haocai's academic activities and theoretical research played a promotional role in the establishment and implementation of the Administrative Procedure Law of the PRC.

relationships.target: 中华全国归国华侨联合会

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才在1990年代曾担任中国侨联副主席。
description.en: Luo Haocai served as the Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Returned Overseas Chinese in the 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 罗豪才在1990年代曾担任中国法学会副会长。
description.en: Luo Haocai served as the Vice President of the China Law Society in the 1990s.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

position.zh-cn: 副院长、审判委员会委员
position.en: Vice President, Member of the Judicial Committee

description.zh-cn: 1995年至1998年，罗豪才担任最高人民法院副院长、审判委员会委员。
description.en: From 1995 to 1998, Luo Haocai served as Vice President and a member of the Judicial Committee of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，罗豪才当选为中国和平统一促进会会长。
description.en: In 2000, Luo Haocai was elected President of the China Council for the Promotion of Peaceful National Reunification.

description.zh-cn: 2007年5月至2016年12月，罗豪才担任中国人权研究会会长。
description.en: From May 2007 to December 2016, Luo Haocai served as President of the China Society for Human Rights Studies.

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月，罗豪才当选第九届全国政协副主席，成为副国级领导人，直至2008年3月卸任。
description.en: In March 1998, Luo Haocai was elected Vice Chairman of the 9th CPPCC National Committee, becoming a deputy national leader, a rank he held until he stepped down in March 2008.
